alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 3:02AM MST until February 16 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of Snow. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. The Wind River Canyon will see 3 to 4 inches of snow. * WHERE...Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains and the Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery to snow covered road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening, and Wednesday morning commutes, over Power River Pass and Granite Pass. The Wind River Canyon will also be impacted by this snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains
